mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, user_pwd, user_info, tel_no, qq_no, email_no, user_address, real_name, id_card, create_time
mapper.select:
select count(*) from test_user
and real_name LIKE #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into test_user ( user_name, user_pwd, user_info, tel_no, qq_no, email_no, user_address, real_name, id_card) values ( #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
